fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_notes: Changes to term lengths are recorded as occurring on the date that a new constitution or constitutional amendment takes force, or, if unavailable, date of promulgation.
fxInfo_ordering: CCP ordering: Asked only if EXECNUM=3 or HOSHOG=2; Constitutions.
fxInfo_question: What is the maximum term length of the head of government?

fxInfo_responses.value: Term length is explicitly unlimited or the life of the office holder.
